channel.title: Look at reason why muted?
channel.description:
************: [clan]slayer tasks 99pestilence: hey 99pestilence: wahts the best thing for a pure range to have? 99pestilence: scope 99pestilence: umm 99pestilence: can u name? 99pestilence: name cape to plox 99pestilence: gtfo noob 99pestilence: omg ************: just for your language 99pestilence: ok i can get my high lvl friends to come and ks u 99pestilence: how would u like that? ************: tha would be great! 99pestilence: ok just for that 99pestilence: i wont attack 99pestilence: huh 99pestilence: maturity overrated ************: thanks for helping me kill ************: your so nice ^_^ 99pestilence: hey l1nch3d 99pestilence: range 99pestilence: can u ks him 99pestilence: hes being a jerk ************: hes just mad because he cussed at me 99pestilence: i didnt ************: so im teaching him a lesson ************: yea 99pestilence: quote it noob 99pestilence: exactly ************: gtfo noob 99pestilence: lol!!! ************: yea ************: lol 99pestilence: becuase u were ksing me 99pestilence: learn a lesson dumb noob ************: im the noob? 99pestilence: ya ************: pfft 99pestilence: my mains lvl 94 combat 99pestilence: and 94 fletching 99pestilence: owns u in the face 99pestilence: and oh ya 71 range ************: aaah fletching the emo skill.... 99pestilence: so gtfo 99pestilence: and 74 mage ************: hmmm ************: normaly people in the 90s have better stats then that 99pestilence: go cut ur self 99pestilence: becuase u have no friends 99pestilence: 80 str 99pestilence: btw 99pestilence: 80 str ************: im so happy for you 99pestilence: go cut urself 99pestilence: make us all happy
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/wtf.jpg[/img] Lol? why did i get muted? Jagex deffinetly /Fails. You can get muted for saying Gtfo. Wow!!!! And wtf is deferred?

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Zammyking111, it looks as though you completely deserved you mute. You are the kind of person who ruins RS, the kind of person who acts like a dick to other people.

Don’t be surprised that you are muted. End of thread.

Oh and by the way; You say Jagex needs to get over “little kids little kids”, well you act like a kid so don’t be so surprised.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Well still they got Chat Filters… That should do it becuase MapleStory is doing better than RS in accounts… And they dont Mute you for dumb stuff like this. And little kids play MapleStory more than RS.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Its not as simple as that, they could face alot bad publicity as Sony and Microsoft did due online abuse on their online networks. So if jagex got this type of publicity ‘Child suffers abuse from online game’, parents would try to stop their children playing the game once they recognized it, would stop paying for memberships and such and could face legal troubles which can lead to fines and such. There are many kids that don’t take alot of the stuff people say to heart but all it takes is one complaint that gets taken to the media and thats it.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Jagex needs to get over little kids, little kids this, little kids that, you know what little kids get a taste of the real world, let the little kids stand up for theirselves. Jagex /Fails.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

“because u have no friends”, “go cut urself”, etc etc. Its not offensive to us but as 10 year olds play that game jagex have to take it seriously. What you said could be classed as abusive/offensive language on any game thats played by younger kids.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at reason why muted?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:
